text:
THE WHITE HOUSE
WASHINGTON
March 13, 1967
Dear Dr. Starcher:
The President has asked me to thank you for
your telegram of support for his Message
to Congress on Education and Health. He
appreciates your interest in educational radio.
We hope that you will make your support known
to Members of Congress.
Douglass Cater
Special Assistant
to the President
Dr. George W. Starcher
President
University of North Dakota
Grand Forks, North Dakota
